meanings.definition: The act or skill of writing using a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: Her fast typing impressed her classmates during the computer class.
meanings.sent2: I need to practice my typing to improve my speed and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The monkey's typing on the keyboard was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: His typing was like a symphony of letters dancing across the screen.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her typing echoed through the quiet room.

meanings.definition: The process of entering or editing text on a computer or typewriter.
meanings.sent1: My typing on the old typewriter was slow but satisfying.
meanings.sent2: She completed the report by diligently typing on her computer.
meanings.sent3: The cat's typing on the keyboard created a jumble of random characters.
meanings.sent4: The typing on the screen seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent5: The typing speed of the professional typist was truly impressive.
